text: Orlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnovoskhodsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 90 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 93 km from Iglino, 8 km from Krasny Voskhod. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Orlovka, Iglinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
